title: Pre-Training Strategies for Optimizing Cognitive Load in Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level basic knowledge in science and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: As a current practitioner, it is necessary to strengthen the competency to solve practical problems in the science field, supported by a digital learning environment using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can reduce extraneous cognitive load by over 20% during scientific problem-solving through pre-training based on concept maps and glossaries.
Learners can select and apply concept map utilization strategies tailored to their prior knowledge levels.
Learners can present at least three cases of schema improvement generated during project-based problem-solving processes.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
